title: 5 Ways Milan-San Remo Shattered Predictions: Pogi-Bombs, MV(d)P’s, and Flying Sunglasses
content:
Tour de Hoody: Pogačar stymied, 'Bling' shows his class, and MVDP is MVP again after cycling's 'hardest race to win' delivers another sizzler.

Read the full article at 5 Ways Milan-San Remo Shattered Predictions: Pogi-Bombs, MV(d)P’s, and Flying Sunglasses on Velo.
author: ahood
